author: 7¹¹ Clerk
text: Our policy is: If for any reason you're not completely satisfied, I hate you.

author: Bender
text: Game's over, losers. I have all the money! Compare your lives to mine and then kill yourselves!

author: Phillip J. Fry
text: Just shut up and take my money!

author: Bender
text: This is the worst kind of discrimination, the kind against me!

author: Turanga Leela
text: Please try to understand: You're a man, I'm a woman. We're just too different.

author: Hubert J. Farnsworth
text: I don't want to live on this planet anymore.

author: Zapp Brannigan
text: You win again, gravity.

author: Bender
text: Oh, wait. You're serious. Let me laugh even harder.

author: Zapp Brannigan
text: Kif, I have made it with a woman. Inform the men.

author: Bender
text: I'm so embarrassed, I wish everybody else was dead.

author: Turanga Leela
text: At the risk of sounding negative ... No!

author: John A. Zoidberg
text: Hooray! A happy ending for the rich people!

author: Phillip J. Fry
text: Ehh, it's like a party in my mouth, and everyone's throwing up.

author: Hermes Conrad
text: With a warning label this big, you know they gotta be fun!

author: Zapp Brannigan
text: That young man fills me with hope. Plus some other emotions which are weird and deeply confusing.

author: Hubert J. Farnsworth
text: Everyone, I have a very dramatic announcement. So anyone with a weak heart should leave now. Goodbye.

author: Phillip J. Fry
text: They're like sex, except I'm having them!

author: Phillip J. Fry
text: Valentine's Days coming? Oh, crap. I forgot to get a girlfriend again.
episode: #20 Put Your Head on My Shoulders

author: Bender
text: Now my usual fee is 500 bucks. But seeing how it's you, I'll need it in advance.
episode: #20 Put Your Head on My Shoulders

author: Hubert J. Farnsworth
text: Now, now, there'll be plenty of time to discuss your objections when and if you return.

author: Lrrr
text: This concept of 'wuv' confuses and infuriates us!

author: Phillip J. Fry
text: Well, thanks to the Internet, I'm now bored with sex.

author: Turanga Leela
text: You can’t keep boogie-ing like this. You’ll come down with a fever of some sort.
